title: Reviews of LOL and Riot, everyone needs to read them to understand what to expect

embed.description: League of Legends (LoL) is a creation of Riot Games inspired by the classic Warcraft III mod Defense of the Ancients. Here you will find some League of Legends reviews, download, guides, live streams, videos, screenshots, news, walkthrough, tips and more.

body: The above link would take you to reviews about Riot that would advise the players of what to expect from this game and from Riot. every new player coming into this game should read those reviews before they regret giving this game and Riot more than they deserve. The countdown for Riot's downfall has started and its just a matter of time before LOL is forgotten/changed/ or bought by a new company that would fix Riot's crap.

Remember at the start of the season when league was dying? 
Remember when league was confirmed to have 100 million active players?

and i wonder if that 100 million "ACTIVE" players are really active and how many of them are duplicate accounts? have you never seen players that are smurfs who are leveling their other accounts? not to mention players that get banned and therefore create a new account (yeah because riot is that dumb and they are not really keeping those players away but rather forcing them to create more accounts which could be for the sole reason of showing the world that they have more players than they really do). 

Anyways before you argue what i was saying in my previous message, i recommend you read the reviews i posted because those reviews are from many different players who have played LOL for years now. My original account was started in 2010 which means i have witnessed all the changes that riot came up with and how it changed. LOL was started as a game for fun true, but along the way Riot lost sight of that and started focusing on more ways to make more money out of the game.

Besides if you look at the final thing i mentioned in my comment "fix Riot's crap" that refers to the game being fixed which means the actual issue with the game isn't the game itself, but rather the company behind it that is running it. No, i just dont waste my time reading the verbal vomit of angry children. I suggest you take a few deep breaths and ask yourself why this is so important to you.

so now that you admitted you haven't read it, why were you trying to mask the truth or lie about it? and this is important because every player needs to know what to expect. i am not telling people to like or hate the game, i am simply telling them to read some reviews because i have come across some valid points within those comments. for one i would say players should not pay for skins or anything else in this game because there is no guarantees that they would not be wasting their money. if a player starts the game and to get ahead quickly ends up dumping hundreds of dollars on the game then for whatever reason he ended up being toxic and getting banned, do you think it would be fair for that player to have paid money only to be permanently banned after a month or so of playing the game? wouldn't that player have wasted his/her money in that case? and no riot would not refund you the money in such cases. if you read the comments you would have noticed that some of them did mention that case. that is why it is important to me to make sure all those new players know exactly what they are getting into and what to expect. i was once blinded to Riot's truth like you are now, but i had friends that showed me how Riot does rip people off and i don't mean money wise only, but also time. Now you get those companies that would help you bump up your rank for a price, you think Riot is not aware of that and taking advantage of it? i freakin get messages from those companies offering such services and i start wondering how is this game fair when some company is bringing in professionals to play on behalf of the regular players that you and i think we are supposed to be going against. and Riot does not prevent that, it encourages it instead.
